entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
